headline: DexCom Stock Declines Following Strong Preliminary Q4 Results
summary: DXCM posts strong preliminary Q4 and full-year 2025 revenue growth, beating estimates, though shares slip after the announcement.

headline: Here's Why You Should Hold DexCom Stock in Your Portfolio for Now
summary: DXCM looks poised for growth as CGM demand expands, G7 and One+ adoption accelerates, and strong Q4 results support a hold stance.
